name: jpBlog :: font-weight normal
description: 大手ブログサービスで文字の太さを強制固定
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
@-moz-document 
domain("blog.shinobi.jp"), 
domain("fc2.com"), 
domain("jugem.jp"), 
domain("livedoor.biz"), 
domain("seesaa.net"), 
domain("cpch.jp"), 
url-prefix("http://blog.livedoor.jp/"){

div#main > div.content *,
td#middle *,
div.article *,
div.blogbody *,
div.commenttext,
div.ently_text *,
div.entry *,
div.entry_body *,
div.EntryBlock *,
div.entry-content *,
div.EntryInnerBlock *,
div.kiji *,
div.mainEntryBase *{
  font-weight:normal!important;
}
}
